overview: Michael Lanyard, aka the Lone Wolf, is sailing to America when he meets pretty Eve de Montalais. Eve wants to sneak her valuable necklace through U.S. customs so that she can use the money from its sale to help straighten out her brother. The only problem is that there is a gang of jewel thieves on board who are just as determined to steal the necklace.
tagline: As a gentleman adventurer, "The Lone Wolf" again becomes involved in a series of gripping events. Packed with mystery and romance.
title: Alias the Lone Wolf
